question:
Consider the following cyclones:
  1. Roanu
  2. Hudhud
  3. Nilofar
  4. Chapala
Which of the above caused damage to eastern coast of India in recent years?
explanation:
• Nilofar was cyclone observed in the Arabian Sea in October 2014
  • Cyclone Roanu was observed recently in Indian Ocean in May 2016 and it caused severe flooding in Sri Lanka and Bangladesh
  • Hudhud was a strong tropical cyclone observed in October 2014 that caused extensive damage and loss of life in eastern India
  • Cyclone Chapala was observed in Arabian Sea in 2015 environmental monitoring in five countries in the lower Mekong region of Southeast Asia.
